meanings.definition: The act or process of making something resistant to water.
meanings.sent1: The waterproofing of the roof prevented any leaks during the storm.
meanings.sent2: I need to apply waterproofing to my shoes before going hiking in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The magician's waterproofing spell kept him dry even in the pouring rain.
meanings.sent4: Her waterproofing skills were so good, it was as if she had a shield against water.
meanings.sent5: The waterproofing on the boat was so effective, it seemed to repel water like magic.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment applied to something to make it resistant to water.
meanings.sent1: The waterproofing on the fabric made it perfect for outdoor furniture.
meanings.sent2: I bought a can of waterproofing spray to protect my new jacket.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the waterproofing into the soup, creating a water-repelling dish.
meanings.sent4: The waterproofing lotion acted like a force field against any water splashes.
meanings.sent5: The waterproofing solution was so effective, it seemed to make the material invincible to water.
